#include<iostream>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
	int num2,num,i,N,two=0,three=0,five=0,j,check;
	cin >> N;
	for (i = 0; i < N; i++)
	{
		two = 0, three = 0, five = 0;
		cin >> num;
		num2 = num;
		for (j = 1; j < num; j++)
		{
			check = j;
			while (1)
			{
				if (check % 2 == 0)
				{
					check /= 2;
					two++;
				}
				else if (check % 3 == 0)
				{
					check /= 3;
					three++;
				}
				else if (check % 5 == 0)
				{
					check /= 5;
					five++;
				}
				if (check % 2 == 0 || check % 5 == 0 || check % 3 == 0)
				{
					continue;
				}
				else
				{
					break;
				}
			}
			
			num2 = j*num2;
		}


		while (1)
		{
			if (num%2== 0)
			{
				num /= 2;
				two++;
			}
			else if (num%3 == 0)
			{
				num /= 3;
				three++;
			}
			else if (num%5 == 0)
			{
				num /= 5;
				five++;
			}
			if (num % 2 == 0 || num % 5 == 0 || num % 3 == 0)
			{
				continue;
			}
			else
			{
				break;
			}
		}

		cout << two<<"\n" << three <<"\n"<< five<<"\n";
		
	}
	return 0;
}
